RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 2 3 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PALACE PRINCE followed a contested pace through the backside angling out while gaining on the far turn bidding three deep in upper stretch clearing late. AMICUS BRIEF pressed the pace taking a short lead at the half working under pressure through the far turn dueling inside of rivals in upper stretch ceding grudgingly late while saving place. STRIKE THE TOP was caught wide hustling into the first turn, continued on pressing on the backside dueling on the far turn extending between horses in upper stretch weakening late. FOREVER POE was never involved. PONT DU GARD pressured the early pace giving way on the far turn. TAMANRASSETT pressed the early pace wilting on the far turn. MYSTIFIED pressed the early pace folding abruptly on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Amicus Brief
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, short lead far turn, dueled inside, grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Palace Prince
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Tenenbaum Jeffrey and Bloom Jeffrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: followed contested pace, angled out far turn, bid three deep

ENTRY.NAME: Mystified
ENTRY.OWNER: Walker Devin D and Parrish Wallace
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, folded far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Forever Poe
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Tamanrassett
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: Pont Du Gard
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, gave way far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Strike the Top
ENTRY.COMMENT: caught wide early, pressed through far turn, between lane short

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 2 3 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SEE SPOT RUN unhurried early advanced into the far turn lloming outside the leader at the quarter pole drawing abreast rival in upper stretch extending to edge clear late. CLASSY AMERICAN sent clear set the pace through the far turn being hooked from the outside in upper stretch battling back ceding grudgingly at the end. HOBE SOUND stalked the pace chasing on the far turn weakening in upper stretch mustering enough late to hold off the others. BLUEBERRY slow early gave a mild middle move racing evenly through the far turn then down the stretch. TEMPLET tracked early then faded on the far turn. LIGHT CRUISER was always outrun. PICKFORD gave early retreat.

ENTRY.NAME: Classy American
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, hooked upper stretch battled gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Hobe Sound
ENTRY.OWNER: Baird, John W. and Harbison, Rex
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased far turn, weakened lane, held others

ENTRY.NAME: Templet
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, faded far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Pickford
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave early retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Light Cruiser
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: See Spot Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, advanced far turn, drew even abreast, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Wayne Hash, Travis Hash & Traci McCord

ENTRY.NAME: Blueberry
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, mild middle move, evenly far turn, no menace

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 12400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 23 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered). (If necessary will be run SAME DISTA NCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IMMACULATE HEART set the pace widening the lead in upper stretch holding firm to wire. GIRO KATE chased the pace to upper stretch responding there to finish well. SMOOTH RITHMS pressed early then chased on the turn wearing down the final eighth. EVER SO D'WILD was eased in mid stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Immaculate Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, drew off upper stretch, held firm

ENTRY.NAME: Ever So d'Wild
ENTRY.COMMENT: eased mid stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Giro Kate
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, extended lane, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth Rithms
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, chased to lane, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 58. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 23 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eli gibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MYRA FLEENER sent clear set the pace through the backside being threatened on the far turn responding to shake clear in upper stretch holding firm the final eighth. SEMIRAMIS gave a prompted middle move gaining to loom on the far turn being rebuffed in upper stretch making no headway the final eighth. NOT SHY slow early raced evenly through the turn moving past tired rivals down the lane. CONDUTTORE stalked the early pace weakening on the far turn. PRECISION PRADO raced mid pack tiring on the far turn. QUITCHERSNIVELIN was never involved. CONNECT IT was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Quitchersnivelin
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Semiramis
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, gained to loom far turn, turned away lane

ENTRY.NAME: Not Shy
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, evenly to lane, gained position

ENTRY.NAME: Precision Prado
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: Myra Fleener
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, threatened far turn, responded

ENTRY.NAME: Connect It
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Conduttore
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, weakened far turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 23 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WEDDING CHAPEL sent clear set the pace widening through the turn into upper stretch proving much the best. SILENCING chased the pace losing ground to the leader through the turn into upper stretch making no headway there was extending abreast rival to save place. SHARP JUSTICE slow early gained on the inside to upper stretch responding there to finish well. DE PURA SANGRE chased early then weakened on the turn. G MONEY LIV hustled along pursued through the turn then tired in upper stretch. DONTLOSETHATNUMBER gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Silencing
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased the pace, extended to lane, no match there, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Dontlosethatnumber
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Sharp Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, gained inside to upper stretch, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Wedding Chapel
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, widened lane, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: De Pura Sangre
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: G Money Liv
ENTRY.COMMENT: h;l pursued through turn, tired lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 90. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 23 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JULIE'S FERRARI engaged to wrest the lead on the turn digging in down the lane finding more. ODIE made the early then would cede under pressure on the turn chasing through the lane to no avail. KANTPAYTHETOLL slow early raced evenly on the turn giving a mild rally in upper stretch finishing well. TEN TWENTY NINE played no factor. HIDDEN RULER dropped back on the inside.

ENTRY.NAME: Odie
ENTRY.COMMENT: made lead, hooked turn, chased lane, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Hidden Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back inside

ENTRY.NAME: Julie's Ferrari
ENTRY.COMMENT: engaged to lead on turn, dug in lane, held gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Ten Twenty Nine
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Kantpaythetoll
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, evenly to lane, finished well

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 5F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 12400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 23 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHELLEY'S GEM pressed the pace wresting a short lead on the turn shaking clear along the inside in upper stretch holding on at the wire. COWGIRL KIMMIE a step slow early racing evenly to upper stretch coming with a late rush just missing three deep. MYRRH pressed the pace through the turn ceding a clear lead to rival in upper stretch coming again late to be right there between horses at the wire. STRADARI faded on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Stradari
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Myrrh
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, ceded top lane, came again between horses

ENTRY.NAME: Cowgirl Kimmie
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, evenly to lane, came with a rush three deep wire

ENTRY.NAME: Shelley's Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led turn, clear inside lane, held on at wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MALIBU COWBOY slow early lost ground to upper stretch coming with a late rush seven wide arriving in time. WICKED REVIEW a step slow through the turn raced evenly to upper stretch finding a late surge to be right there at the wire along the rail. SPICE CITY away alertly set the pace through the turn drifting out eight wide into upper stretch angling back in before weakening late. STUNNING HERO stalked the pace through the turn pressing in the three path upper stretch weakening late. LET'S EAT hustled in mid pack lacked a late response. OFF TO THE RACES chased through the turn bidding in upper stretch weakening late. LUTE'S ANGEL was never involved. BALLOT BOX was always outrun. PAPA DEL CIELO tracked the pace tiring in upper strech. PISTOL JERRY dropped well back early.

ENTRY.NAME: Stunning Hero
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased to lane, bud three path, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Ballot Box
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Lute's Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Review
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow through turn, evenly to lane, surged gamely rail

ENTRY.NAME: Let's Eat
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled mid pack, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Spice City
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drifted out into lane, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Papa Del Cielo
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Pistol Jerry
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped well back early

ENTRY.NAME: Off to the Races
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased through the turn, extended lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu Cowboy
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lost ground to lane, came with a seven wide
